title: [1.8-1.9] [128X128] BufyCraft —— 超棒的高清材质
author: 幻境雲達達
txt_content:
本帖最后由 XJue_DaDa 于 2016-8-5 21:17 编辑 

 
 【 作者の发布planetminecraft介绍 】 
? Hello! I'm Bufy and this is my resource pack.   This resource pack is intended to be realistic as possible   but is has some cartoonish textures in it.   I started this resourcepack 2 years ago, improving and changing blocks in every update,   learning new texturing techniques and now i'm working on doing  the best textures as my brain can do.   To Play Like the screenshots you must download   glsl shaders and the shaderpack.   (Optifine 1.8.9 has shaders inside)   Remember this resource pack is in development,   so expect some bugs and not finalized stuff.   I hope you enjoy it and stay tuned for the updates! 

 【How to install this resourcepack】 
1- Download the resource pack (Disable adblock Please :D)      2- Press Start and type in %appdata%      3- Find and open your .minecraft folder      4- Locate your resourcepacks folder      5- Drag and Drop the texture .zip file into this folder.      6- Open Minecraft and load the Resource pack      7- Done!!!

[board] 【图片展示】 [board]















[water_buket] 【下载地址】 [water_buket]http://pan.baidu.com/s/1dDGpZtJ
